name: @ztrehagem/openapi-codegen-typescript
description: Code generation tools from OpenAPI Specification to TypeScript.
author: Shigeki Suwa <shigeki.suwa@ztrehagem.dev>

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.dist-esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.dist-cjs.json
scripts.example: npm run build && ts-node example/main.ts && tsc --noEmit example/driver.ts
